description: Phase 1.5 (Mutable Plans) COMPLETE - Implemented plan() tool with 6 actions (save/get/list/activate/update/complete), atomic file updates, SQL views, 22 unit tests + 8 integration tests all passing. TDD methodology: RED (22 failing tests) → GREEN (minimal implementation) → REFACTOR (extracted helpers). Key features: stable filenames (plan_slug.json), one active plan, mutable updates, full SQL searchability.
